thread.title: Cheryl Grinston-Ford

author: Cheryl Grinston-Ford
title: Cheryl Grinston-Ford
text: I was satisfied with the great customer service that I received from the Verizon representative during our phone conversation concerning my request and concerns with what I wanted for my home. I am looking forward to the quality service that Verizon has to offer for my internet, land line phone and television viewing in my home. I am giving Verizon a second chance since this will be my second time changing my service to them and letting go of another cable company that was incompetent and unreliable. Hopefully I will not regret changing my service and will be satisfied.
